# AI Audio Editor Project

This is a Python project for an AI-powered audio editor that processes raw music recordings and transforms them into polished, listenable songs.

## Project Structure
- `src/` - Main source code
- `src/audio/` - Audio processing modules
- `src/ai/` - AI/ML models for intelligent editing
- `src/utils/` - Utility functions
- `tests/` - Test files
- `data/` - Sample audio files and training data

## Key Technologies
- Python 3.10+
- librosa - Audio analysis
- pydub - Audio manipulation
- torch/torchaudio - AI/ML processing
- soundfile - Audio file I/O
- numpy - Numerical operations

## Development Guidelines
- Use type hints for all functions
- Follow PEP 8 style guidelines
- Write unit tests for new features
- Document all public APIs
